item.title: CVE-2021-32453|2024-09-16T17:03:17.777Z -- sitel -- cap%2Fprx
item.description: SITEL CAP/PRX firmware version 5.2.01 allows an attacker with access to the local network, to access via HTTP to the internal configuration database of the device without any authentication. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability in order to obtain information about the deviceÂ´s configuration.
